verification.title: Verify Your Email Address
verification.subtitle: Verify your email address
verification.description: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
verification.checkSpam: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
verification.resendSuccess: New verification email sent! Check your inbox.
verification.step2: Click the verification link in the email
verification.step3: Return here and click 'I've verified my email'

errors.resendFailed: Unable to resend verification email. Please try again.

verifyEmail.subtitle: Verify your email address
verifyEmail.verifyingDescription: Please wait while we verify your email address...
verifyEmail.successDescription: Your email address has been verified. You can now proceed with setting up your profile.
verifyEmail.error: Unable to verify email. Please try again.
verifyEmail.tokenExpired: Verification token is invalid or expired.
verifyEmail.resendDescription: If your verification link has expired or is invalid, you can request a new one.
verifyEmail.resendSuccess: New verification email sent! Check your inbox.
verifyEmail.resendError: Unable to resend verification email. Please try again.
